Psionic_Dart.display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Psionic_Dart.display_target_help: Your attack speed has been reduced.

Psionic_Lash.display_help: You channel energy into your whip and lash out at your foe, dealing high energy damage and causing fire damage over time. Lash has longer range than most melee attacks. It will reduce the target's damage resistance and also has a chance to knockdown your target.
Psionic_Lash.display_short_help: Melee (Long), Moderate DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Fire), -Rech (Foe), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)
Psionic_Lash.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning. Your attack speed has also been reduced.

Psionic_Siphon.display_help: You hold your target with your psionic whip, preventing them from moving. While they helplessly tremble under your gaze, you are healed while they suffer psionic and fire damage over time. The affected target is also made highly resistant to healing.

Psychic_Blast.display_help: This attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Psychic_Blast.display_target_help: Your powers are recharging more slowly.

Subdue.display_help: Using your own hyperactive mind, you lash out in an effort to subdue the weaker mind of your foes. This causes psionic damage and has the potential to immobilize your foes.

Overload.display_help: You continuously remain hovering in a delicate psychic balance due to the traumas inflicted by Mother Mayhem and Malaise. When you are nearly defeated in combat, all control over this balance is lost, causing a powerful eruption of psionic energy that deals significant damage to your foes.
Overload.display_target_help: You have been hit by an explosion!

Psionic_Lash.display_help: You channel energy into your whip and lash out at your foe, dealing high energy damage and causing fire damage over time. Lash has longer range than most melee attacks. It will reduce the target's damage resistance and also has a chance to knockdown your target.
Psionic_Lash.display_short_help: Melee (Long), Minor DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Fire), -Rech (Foe), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)
Psionic_Lash.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning. Your attack speed has also been reduced.

Psionic_Thrash.display_help: You create a whip of pure psionic energy and make an impressive sweep, causing psionic damage to enemies within a wide cone. Affected targets are seared by this attack and suffer additional fire damage over time. They also are unable to fly and suffer both reduced movement and attack speed. There is also a chance that affected targets will be knocked back.
Psionic_Thrash.display_short_help: Melee (Long Cone), Moderate DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Fire), -Speed (Foe, All), Chance for Knockback (Foe)
Psionic_Thrash.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning. You are also unable to fly and both your movement and attack speeds are reduced.

Telekinetic_Lift.display_help: You channel energy into your whip and make an impressive sweep, causing high energy damage to enemies within a wide cone and also causing some fire damage over time. Coruscating Thrash has a larger range than most melee cones. Targets that are struck will also have their resistance to damage reduced for a short time and may be knocked down.

Psionic_Wounds.display_help: The target is made to believe that they are suffering from real, bleeding wounds, but the effects are initially only in their mind. Only at the end are the wounds made real in a burst of lethal damage.
Psionic_Wounds.display_target_help: You are suffering psionic damage over time.

Psychic_Scream.display_help: You unleash a psychic scream that deals psionic damage to your target and increases recharge time, effectively reducing attack speed.
Psychic_Scream.display_target_help: Your powers are recharging more slowly.

Psychic_Battery.display_help: Using your mind, you increase the strength of all your nearby Awakened allies and their possessed Seers.
Psychic_Battery.display_target_help: Your damage and To Hit have been increased by a Conduit.

Psionic_Wounds.display_help: The target is made to believe that they are suffering from real, bleeding wounds, but the effects are initially only in their mind. Only at the end are the wounds made real in a burst of lethal damage.
Psionic_Wounds.display_target_help: You are suffering psionic damage over time.

Nullify_Pain.display_help: Nullify Pain will heal nearby allies for some hit points by numbing the pain caused by their wounds. Nullify Pain is not as potent as Soothe, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate
Nullify_Pain.display_target_help: You have been healed by an ally!

Psionic_Fury.display_help: You create a powerful psionic storm at your target's location. This hits any targets caught within its area of effect on an ongoing basis, but can be avoided if the area is evacuated.

Explosion.display_help: You have erupted in a burst of psionic energy!
Explosion.display_target_help: You have erupted in a burst of psionic energy!

Psionic_Blast.display_help: You fire a psionic burst at the target, causing psionic damage and reducing attack speed.
Psionic_Blast.display_target_help: Your attack speed has been reduced.

Psionic_Torment.display_help: You create painful visions within the mind of your target, causing psionic damage. These visions manifest as wounds that cause lethal damage over time. Affected targets also suffer reduced regeneration, recovery and attack speed.
Psionic_Torment.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time. Additionally, your regeneration, recovery and attack speed have been reduced.

Psionic_Crush.display_help: You imprison your target in a field of collapsing psionic energy. They are held in place and suffer continuous psionic damage and endurance loss.
Psionic_Crush.display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG (Psionic), Moderate DoT (Psionic), -End (Foe), Hold (Foe)
Psionic_Crush.display_target_help: You are suffering psionic damage over time and losing endurance.

Psionic_Shock.display_help: You unleash a bolt of pure psionic energy on your target, causing psionic damage and draining endurance.
Psionic_Shock.display_target_help: You are losing endurance over time.

Psionic_Pulse.display_help: You unleash a powerful psionic shockwave that ripples through the air around you, dealing Psionic and Smashing damage to any hit by the wave. The shockwave also has a chance to knockback its targets.
Psionic_Pulse.display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG (Psionic/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Psionic_Void.display_help: You create a field of psionic energy at the feet of up to two targets. This field deals continuous psionic damage over time.

Psionic_Flow.display_help: You create a powerful stream of psionic energy. This causes significant psionic damage to all enemies caught in its field, as well as drains endurance and lowers recovery.
Psionic_Flow.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Extreme DMG (Psionic), -End (Foe), -Rec (Foe), +DMG(Self, Psionic), +DEF(Self, Psionic)
Psionic_Flow.display_target_help: You are losing endurance over time and your recovery has been reduced.

Shards_of_the_Self.display_help: You have created shards of yourself to aid you in battle.

Overload.display_help: You continuously remain hovering in a delicate psychic balance due to the traumas inflicted by Mother Mayhem and Malaise. When you are nearly defeated in combat, all control over this balance is lost, causing a powerful eruption of psionic energy that deals significant damage to your foes.
Overload.display_target_help: You have been hit by an explosion!

Psionic_Cut.display_help: You cut your target with a blade formed from within your mind. This manifested blade causes psionic damage and leaves injuries that cause additional lethal damage over time. The target also suffers a reduction in their attack speed.
Psionic_Cut.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time and have a reduced attack speed.

Psionic_Thrust.display_help: You hack your target with a blade formed from within your mind. This manifested blade causes psionic damage and leaves injuries that cause additional lethal damage over time. The target also suffers a reduction in their attack speed, chance to hit, regeneration and recovery. The target may also be taunted to attack you if they are not already doing so.
Psionic_Thrust.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG (Psionic), Moderate DoT (Lethal), -Rech(Foe), -ToHit(Foe), -Regen(Foe), -Rec(Foe), Chance for Taunt(Foe)
Psionic_Thrust.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time. You are also experiencing reduced attack speed, chance to hit, regeneration and recovery. You may also be taunted.

Psionic_Slash.display_help: You slash your target with a blade formed from within your mind. This manifested blade causes psionic damage and leaves injuries that cause additional lethal damage over time. The target also suffers a reduction in their regeneration and damage potential.
Psionic_Slash.display_short_help: Melee (Cone), Moderate DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Lethal), -Regen(Foe), -DMG(Foe, All)
Psionic_Slash.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time. You are also experiencing reduced regeneration and damage potential.

Metabolic_Superiority.display_help: Your mind exerts an extremely powerful hold over your body, naturally increasing your regeneration rate, attack speed and chance to hit. Moreover, your force of will makes attacks that would reduce these attributes or your movement speeds less effective.

Mental_Breakdown.display_help: You create a powerful illusion in the minds of your targets, causing them to become rapidly hyperstressed. This causes a cascading reaction in the mind that causes psionic damage. The effects of this reaction linger, causing additional psionic damage over time. Additionally, affected targets suffer reduced regeneration, recovery and healing effectiveness. Finally, the endorphins released within your own body as the success of your attack heal you.
Mental_Breakdown.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), High DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Psionic), -Regen(Foe), -Rec(Foe), +RES(Foe, Heal), Heal(Self)
Mental_Breakdown.display_target_help: You are suffering psionic damage over time. Additionally, your regeneration, recovery and healing effectiveness have been reduced.

Psionic_Carapace.display_help: You create a powerful illusion in the minds of your targets, causing them to become rapidly hyperstressed. This causes a cascading reaction in the mind that causes psionic damage. The effects of this reaction linger, causing additional psionic damage over time. Additionally, affected targets suffer reduced regeneration, recovery and healing effectiveness. Finally, the endorphins released within your own body as the success of your attack heal you.
Psionic_Carapace.display_target_help: You are suffering psionic damage over time. Additionally, your regeneration, recovery and healing effectiveness have been reduced.

Psionic_Lightning.display_help: You cause a bolt of psionic energy to strike your foe, dealing heavy damage. These bolts also have a chance to drain the enemy's endurance.
Psionic_Lightning.display_target_help: You are taking damage over time and are losing endurance.

Psionic_Tornado.display_help: Unleashes a whirlwind of Psionic energy on a target, tossing nearby foes into the air. The Psionic Tornado damages foes and slows their attack speed. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Psionic_Tornado.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), High Damage(Psionic), Foe Knockup
Psionic_Tornado.display_target_help: Your powers are recharging more slowly.

Mass_Levitate.display_help: You can send multiple targets violently into the air, then slam them to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Mass_Levitate.display_target_help: You have been knocked down and your ability to fly is hindered.

Frazzle.display_help: The crackling energy coursing around you continuously shocks foes, dealing damage and instilling in them a sense of doom and disarray.
Frazzle.display_target_help: The crackling energy around the Mindstorm is unsettling, terrorizing you.

Psionic_Blast.display_help: You fire a psionic burst at the target, causing damage.

Mind_Siphon.display_help: You gradually siphon the minds of all those around you. The longer they remain close to you, the worse this becomes, until they become confused.
Mind_Siphon.display_target_help: The Awakened is siphoning control of your mind. The longer you remain in its presence, the more under its control you fall. Eventually, you will succumb and be confused for 10 seconds. After the Mind Siphon takes effect, however, you will be immune to its effects for a brief period of time.

Psionic_Pulse.display_help: You unleash a powerful psionic shockwave that ripples through the air around you, dealing Psionic and Smashing damage to any hit by the wave. The shockwave also has a chance to knockback its targets.
Psionic_Pulse.display_target_help: You are knocked off your feet!

Explosion.display_help: You have erupted in a burst of psionic energy!
Explosion.display_target_help: An Awakened has erupted in a burst of psionic energy.

Explosion.display_help: You have erupted in a burst of psionic energy!
Explosion.display_target_help: An Awakened has erupted in a burst of psionic energy.

Penelope_Yin_Transformation.display_help: Penelope Yin transforms into Penelope Mayhem

Psionic_Blast.display_help: You fire a psionic burst at the target, causing damage and reducing attack speed.
Psionic_Blast.display_target_help: Your attack speed has been reduced.

Psionic_Crush.display_help: You imprison your target in a field of collapsing psionic energy. They are held in place and suffer continuous damage and endurance loss.
Psionic_Crush.display_target_help: You are suffering psionic damage over time and losing endurance!

Psionic_Torment.display_help: You create painful visions within the mind of your target, causing psionic damage. These visions manifest as wounds that cause lethal damage over time. Affected targets also suffer reduced regeneration, recovery and attack speed.
Psionic_Torment.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time. Additionally, your regeneration, recovery and attack speed have been reduced.

Psionic_Drift.display_help: You induce a dream state in all nearby targets around you while also dealing continuous psionic damage. These dreams can manifest as nightmares, lucid dreams or deep sleep, which manifest as fear, confusion or stun.
Psionic_Drift.display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Psionic), Stun/Fear/Confuse(Foe)
Psionic_Drift.display_target_help: You are suffering psionic damage over time and are either feared, confused or stunned.

Psionic_Burst.display_help: You unleash a powerful psionic shockwave that ripples through the air around you, dealing Psionic and Smashing damage to any hit by the wave. The shockwave also has a chance to knockback its targets.

Psionic_Blade.display_help: You create a blade of crystalline psionic energy around your hand and use it to stab your target with a quick attack. The target suffers psionic damage, followed by a wound that causes lethal damage over time and reduced defense.
Psionic_Blade.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Psionic), Moderate DoT (Lethal), -Def(Foe, All)

Psionic_Thrust.display_help: You create a blade of crystalline psionic energy around your hand and viciously stab your target. The target suffers psionic damage, followed by a wound that causes lethal damage over time and reduced resistance to further psionic damage.
Psionic_Thrust.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG (Psionic), Moderate DoT (Lethal), -Res(Foe, Psionic)
Psionic_Thrust.display_target_help: You are bleeding and suffering from reduced resistance to psionic damage.

Psionic_Nexus.display_help: You create a a nexus of psionic energy at your location.

Impenetrable_Mind.display_help: You are naturally protected from psionic damage, gaining a boost to your psionic resistance and defense.
Impenetrable_Mind.display_target_help: You are naturally protected from psionic damage, gaining a boost to your psionic resistance and defense.

Initial.display_help: You call forth a powerful stream of lightning from the highest reaches of the atmosphere. This Flow Lightning causes significant energy damage to all enemies caught in its field, as well as drains endurance and lowers recovery.
Initial.display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Extreme DMG (Energy), -End (Foe), -Rec (Foe), +DMG(Self, Energy), +DEF(Self, Energy)
Initial.display_target_help: Your Recovery has been reduced and your Endurance is being drained.

Ongoing.display_help: You call forth a powerful stream of lightning from the highest reaches of the atmosphere. This Flow Lightning causes significant energy damage to all enemies caught in its field, as well as drains endurance and lowers recovery.
Ongoing.display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Extreme DMG (Energy), -End (Foe), -Rec (Foe), +DMG(Self, Energy), +DEF(Self, Energy)
Ongoing.display_target_help: Your Recovery has been reduced and your Endurance is being drained.

Psionic_Fury.display_help: You create a powerful lightning storm at your target's location. This hits any targets caught within its area of effect on an ongoing basis, but can be avoided if the area is evacuated.
Psionic_Fury.display_target_help: You are suffering psionic damage over time. Also, your recovery, regeneration and attack speed have been reduced and your endurance is being drained.

Psionic_Lightning.display_help: You cause a bolt of psionic energy to strike your foe, dealing heavy damage. These bolts also have a chance to drain the enemy's endurance.

Psionic_Tornado.display_help: You unleash a whirling vortex of psionic energy at your target, causing the target and those near them to be afflicted with moderate damage over time. Additionally, all affected targets are knocked into the air and suffer reduced attack speed.
Psionic_Tornado.display_target_help: You are suffering psionic damage over time and reduced recharge rate!

Psionic_Eruption_Grant.display_help: You are building up psionic energy to unleash in a massive explosion.
Psionic_Eruption_Grant.display_target_help: You are building up psionic energy to unleash in a massive explosion.

Psionic_Eruption.display_help: You have built up enough psionic energy to unleash a powerful explosion, centered on a targeted foe. This explosion causes significant psionic damage to the target and all those caught nearby.

Master.display_help: All foes caught in this field of twisting psionic energy will take continuous damage. The field will grow over time.
Master.display_target_help: All foes caught in this field of twisting psionic energy will take continuous damage. The field will grow over time.

Small.display_help: All foes caught in this field of twisting psionic energy will take continuous damage. The field will grow over time.
Small.display_target_help: All foes caught in this field of twisting psionic energy will take continuous damage. The field will grow over time.

Medium.display_help: All foes caught in this field of twisting psionic energy will take continuous damage. The field will grow over time.
Medium.display_target_help: All foes caught in this field of twisting psionic energy will take continuous damage. The field will grow over time.

Large.display_help: All foes caught in this field of twisting psionic energy will take continuous damage. The field will grow over time.
Large.display_target_help: All foes caught in this field of twisting psionic energy will take continuous damage. The field will grow over time.

Psionic_Break.display_help: You snap at your target, mentally injuring them. The target takes psionic damage and experiences reduced Regeneration. Their mind makes the pain of the break real, causing the target to also suffer lethal damage as they start to bleed.
Psionic_Break.display_target_help: Your regeneration rate has been reduced and you are bleeding!

Psychic_Roar.display_help: You unleash a frightening psychic roar that harms the minds of those around you. So intimidating is this roar that your targets may also become briefly terrified of you.

Psionic_Dart.display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Psionic_Dart.display_target_help: Your attack speed has been reduced.

Damage_MN.display_help: The Awakened have had their pain centers burned away by Mother Mayhem and Malaise. In addition to the natural Psionic resistance of Seers, the Awakened are resistant to Fire damage.
Damage_MN.display_target_help: The Awakened have had their pain centers burned away by Mother Mayhem and Malaise. In addition to the natural Psionic resistance of Seers, the Awakened are resistant to Fire damage.

Damage_LT.display_help: The Awakened have had their pain centers burned away by Mother Mayhem and Malaise. In addition to the natural Psionic resistance of Seers, the Awakened are resistant to Fire damage.
Damage_LT.display_target_help: The Awakened have had their pain centers burned away by Mother Mayhem and Malaise. In addition to the natural Psionic resistance of Seers, the Awakened are resistant to Fire damage.

Damage_BS.display_help: The Awakened have had their pain centers burned away by Mother Mayhem and Malaise. In addition to the natural Psionic resistance of Seers, the Awakened are resistant to Fire damage.
Damage_BS.display_target_help: The Awakened have had their pain centers burned away by Mother Mayhem and Malaise. In addition to the natural Psionic resistance of Seers, the Awakened are resistant to Fire damage.

Damage_EB.display_help: The Awakened have had their pain centers burned away by Mother Mayhem and Malaise. In addition to the natural Psionic resistance of Seers, the Awakened are resistant to Fire damage.
Damage_EB.display_target_help: The Awakened have had their pain centers burned away by Mother Mayhem and Malaise. In addition to the natural Psionic resistance of Seers, the Awakened are resistant to Fire damage.

Damage_AV.display_help: The Awakened have had their pain centers burned away by Mother Mayhem and Malaise. In addition to the natural Psionic resistance of Seers, the Awakened are resistant to Fire damage.
Damage_AV.display_target_help: The Awakened have had their pain centers burned away by Mother Mayhem and Malaise. In addition to the natural Psionic resistance of Seers, the Awakened are resistant to Fire damage.

Psychic_Lash.display_help: You can send a large blast of energy at a foe, dealing heavy damage and draining some Endurance. Some of this Endurance may transfer back to you. There is also a chance that you will reduce your target's chance to hit and their Recovery. Damage: High, Recharge: Very Fast

Psionic_Blast.display_help: You fire a psionic burst at the target, causing damage. Recharge: Moderate

Psionic_Pulse.display_help: You unleash a powerful psionic shockwave that ripples through the air around you, dealing Psionic and Smashing damage to any hit by the wave. The shockwave also has a chance to knockback its targets. Recharge: Moderate
Psionic_Pulse.display_target_help: You are knocked off your feet!

Psionic_Fury.display_help: You create a powerful lightning storm at your target's location. This hits any targets caught within its area of effect on an ongoing basis, but can be avoided if the area is evacuated. Recharge: Slow
Psionic_Fury.display_target_help: You are caught in a dangerous Lightning Storm!

Consume.display_help: The Subjugator targets one of its Subjugated Seers and consumes her psychically. This kills the pet, but heals the Subjugator by a significant amount. The attack can be interrupted. Recharge: Slow
Consume.display_attacker_attack_floater: A Subjugator Prepares to Consume a Seer!

Consumption.display_help: The Subjugator targets one of its Subjugated Seers and consumes her psychically. This kills the pet, but heals the Subjugator by a significant amount. The attack can be interrupted. Recharge: Very Fast

Defenses.display_help: The Subjugators have been so heavily corrupted by Psionic energy that there is little more that can be twisted within them. This gives them periods of extreme defense against Psionic attacks.

Oppressor.display_help: You have summoned subjugated Seers to aid you!

Subjugator.display_help: You have summoned subjugated Seers to aid you!
